### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#16411](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16411.html) (Signet support by kallewoof)

If you cons
Why submit this as a separate PR? Just include this commit in the work you mention in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15845#issuecomment-534618388?
> Why submit this as a separate PR? Just include this commit in the work you mention in #15845 (comment)?\n\nA wallet change shouldn't change validation code
It seems like #15845 isn't going anywhere soon.\n\nI think the change in this PR should be reverted until it's actually needed.
Eh? I use it in tests I wrote locally. I plan to submit them soon TM (c) 2020
